oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Galois action on geometric lattices and the mod-$\ell$ I/OM
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Topaz, Adam
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
Mathematics - K-Theory and Homology
Mathematics - Number Theory
12F10, 12G, 12J10, 19D45
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper studies the Galois action on a special lattice of geometric origin, which is related to mod-$\ell$ abelian-by-central quotients of geometric fundamental groups of varieties. As a consequence, we formulate and prove the mod-$\ell$ abelian-by-central variant/strengthening of a conjecture due to Ihara/Oda-Matsumoto.
